fields.value: Replication Data for: Resist to Commit: Concrete Campaign Statements and the Need to Clarify a Partisan Reputation

dsDescriptionValue.value: Data files for reproducing all models in "Resist to Commit." The party-election-level data (i.e. "EL_JOP_RepData.dta") is the combination of Seki & Williams (2014), "MPDataset_MPDS2015a.csv", the Comparative Political Data set (Armingeon et al. 2015), and our measure of manifesto concreteness. This data reproduces the models in the main text and the models in Appendices B & C. Each variable in the data files is described in the data. Separate files exist for reproducing the analyses in Appendix A. Please contact the authors for information regarding the data generating process.

files.description: Data file for reproducing the simulations and data analysis in Figure A1. Respondent-level data with the number of correct classifications for the pairwise combinations. Data generation is described in the manuscript. Please contact the authors for the disaggregated (survey) data.
files.label: EL_JOP_AppendixA1.dta

dataFile.description: Data file for reproducing the simulations and data analysis in Figure A1. Respondent-level data with the number of correct classifications for the pairwise combinations. Data generation is described in the manuscript. Please contact the authors for the disaggregated (survey) data.

files.description: Data file for reproducing the simulations and data analysis in Figure A2. Respondent-level data with the number of correct classifications for the sentence categorization. Data generation is described in the manuscript. Please contact the authors for the disaggregated (survey) data.
files.label: EL_JOP_AppendixA2.dta

dataFile.description: Data file for reproducing the simulations and data analysis in Figure A2. Respondent-level data with the number of correct classifications for the sentence categorization. Data generation is described in the manuscript. Please contact the authors for the disaggregated (survey) data.

files.description: Script for processing "EL_JOP_AppendixA1.dta" and "EL_JOP_AppendixA2.dta" for reproducing the simulations and analyses in Appendix A.
files.label: EL_JOP_AppendixFile.R

dataFile.description: Script for processing "EL_JOP_AppendixA1.dta" and "EL_JOP_AppendixA2.dta" for reproducing the simulations and analyses in Appendix A.

files.description: Data file for all of the models. Party-Election-level data include variables that characterize the prior governing period and our own measure for manifesto concreteness. Variables for the prior governing period are a result of a merge between Seki & Williams (2014), "MPDataset_MPDS2015a.csv", and the Comparative Political Data set (Armingeon et al. 2015).
files.label: EL_JOP_RepData.dta

dataFile.description: Data file for all of the models. Party-Election-level data include variables that characterize the prior governing period and our own measure for manifesto concreteness. Variables for the prior governing period are a result of a merge between Seki & Williams (2014), "MPDataset_MPDS2015a.csv", and the Comparative Political Data set (Armingeon et al. 2015).

files.description: Script for reproducing all empirical models that use "EL_JOP_RepData.dta". This includes all empirical models in the main text, Appendix B, and Appendix C.
files.label: EL_JOP_RepDoFile.do

dataFile.description: Script for reproducing all empirical models that use "EL_JOP_RepData.dta". This includes all empirical models in the main text, Appendix B, and Appendix C.
